label: US Route 17 Photo 524
description: House (rear and side view) on site affected by the construction of the Crosstown. Address: 215 Spring Street. Corner of Spring Street and Vaughan Street. Paint and hardware store across the street. Surveyor notations on back of photo: "Dkt.: 10.524. Property owner: Ruby E. Jacobs. Tract: 163. Station: 18+85 Rt. Spring Street. Date: Dec. 2, 1964. Partially In R/W - Bought." [See collection description for explanation of surveyor notations.]
